Title: Four scenes in the countryside (3-4)
Publisher: Hubei renmin chubanshe (湖北人民出版社)
Notes: On the left: a female pilot talking with female peasants while an airplane sprays pesticide over the fields in the background.On the right: a generator and a crate with light bulbs arrive.Second of a set of two posters, the first one is here.This is a print from the second edition (July 1964).
